page.title: 13BIOGRAPHY OF BURNTWOOD contd
page.content: OLD MAN - Life is quite enjoyable because he has the money to do what he wants and the time to do so. He doesn't use his education much. YOUNG WOMEN - Life in Chastown can be both boring and hectic. Many have young children to lookafter and this can be demanding. Many of them are housewives. Children prevent their parents from going out. MIDDLE AGED WOMAN - Many women go to work and their days are busy. They still have to do their daily house- work. They do go out at nights but their transport is limited. OLD WOMEN - In some cases husbands have died and as a result older women get out as much as possible, to other towns. Many old women think more entertainment is needed for the young.
